name: apollos
description: A reactive framework for incredible applications

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean && npm run docs:publish
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g rackt/redux
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:rackt/redux gh-pages --force
